This website it dedicated to explaining statistical concepts in an easy to understand manner. Utilizing references and a straight to coding methodology, the reader should be better able to not only understand but duplicate simple statistical analyses.

<br>

The analyses on this website were built utilizing `R` [@RCoreTeam2024] with additional packages `ggplot2` [@ggplot2],`ppcor` [@ppcor], `dplyr` [@dplyr], `reactable` [@reactable], `DiagrammeR` [@DiagrammeR], `mathjaxr` [@mathjaxr], `latexpdf` [@latexpdf], `klippy` [@klippy] psych`[@psych].

The following reference books were utilized for the statistical concepts presented, @hatcher2013.
